description: Automated workflow is a proven method for removing process variability. DevOps pipelines are the next step in the evolution of CI/CD/DevOps. This talk covers Jenkins pipelines, both with and without AWS integration, and explains how Jenkins can be used to create, execute and manage pipelines.
short_description: Automated workflow is a proven method for removing process variability. DevOps pipelines are the next step in the evolution of C
title: Jenkins World 2016 - Pipelining DevOps with Jenkins and AWS
